page.title: 05OUR MOTORWAY SURVEY :BO'NESS
page.content: On Thursday 30th May 1985 we did a {survey}(for 1 hour) on the{M9}which runs from Stirling to Edinburgh. We counted the vehicles from a flyover where the A803 crosses over the M9. In our survey we found out that the number of cars coming from the west was about the same as the number coming from the east. We saw a Porsche and a white Lotus.Altogether the number of vehicles coming from the east was 221 and there were 229 coming from the west. We saw only 2 buses coming in each direction.
